posts.title: Your remote Github CMS
posts.body: DashPilot is a free CMS that saves data to your own Github Repo. Just connect DashPilot to your GitHub account and instantly start editing!

posts.title: Works with any Static site generator or Single Page App
posts.body: DashPilot saves your data as JSON to your own Github repo, allowing you to integrate it with many Static Site Generators and Single Page Applications.

posts.title: Automatically publish to GitHub Pages, Netlify or Vercel
posts.body: Because your site lives on GitHub, you can automatically publish your site to GitHub Pages, Netlify, Vercel or any other service that works with GitHub.
